newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Hotel Grand Central sees better results.
newsitem.headline: Hotel Grand Central sees better results.

text.p: Hotel and properties firm Hotel Grand Central Ltd said on Monday it expects 1997 results to improve.
Grand Central's "directors expect the results for 1997 to improve satisfactorily," the company said in a statement on results for the year ended December 31, 1996.

It said the extension, renovation and refurbishment of most of its hotels in Australia and New Zealand had been completed in 1996, and that it had established a hotel chain under the name "Hotel Grand Chancellor."
The company reported a 47 percent fall to Singapore $5.87 million in net profit in 1996.
